title: Patient Safety Education Applying Integrated Teaching Methods: Mobile Microlearning Course

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practice-Centered Design Integrating Patient Safety Education Based on Australian Nursing Curriculum Research, Optimized for Mobile Environments Using Digital Devices

learning_goals: Identify at least three patient safety risk factors by analyzing real clinical scenarios
Select two WHO patient safety core domains (medication, infection, surgery, etc.) and present prevention strategies through mobile content-based case studies
Design patient safety improvement plans through team-based mobile projects and submit them as digital portfolios
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
